allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: resolve blank page issue in RL web module

Root cause: Double pygame initialization was causing the browser
to render a blank page. The main.py called pygame.init() before
creating the visualizer, but pygame should only be initialized
once in the visualizer''s __init__ method.

Changes:
- Removed pygame.init() from main.py async main() function
- Added pygame.init() to RLVisualizer.__init__() to match search module pattern
- Added explanatory comment about why not to initialize in main()

This matches the working search module architecture where pygame.init()
is called in the visualizer constructor, not in the main loop.
